moves.1. c4: I'm playing black here and i haven't noticed how high his grade is yet.
moves.1... e5 2. Nc3 Nf6 3. Nf3 d6: Fairly normal opening up to here so i don't feel too bad yet.
moves.4. Qc2 Nc6 5. e3 Bg4: Not much point because he would just defend with bishop. I'm the kind of guy who doesn't want to make the first moves. I like to counter attack and not start it.
moves.6... Qd7: Just wasting moves. I know I know. for all you 'GREAT' chess players out there, it's not a wise thing to do. But oh well.
moves.7. d4: At last the first proper attack.
moves.7... exd4 8. exd4 Bxf3 9. Bxf3 Nxd4: After that exchange i am a pawn up!!!
moves.10. Qd3 Nxf3+ 11. Qxf3: Oh yeah, i also like killing pieces.
moves.15. Bh4 Rfe8 16. Re3: I'm not sure what that was supposed to do. If you have ideas leave a comment!!!
moves.16... Qg4: I want to trade queens, please?
moves.18... Rxe7 19. Bxe7 f6: HAHAHAHAHA no escape for you now!!!!
moves.22. f4: I guess that was supposed to stop my knight moving anywhere. But that won't stop me!!!
moves.23... Rxe1#: But i'm sure he didn't see THAT. HAHAHAHA
